titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1956) to regulate certain State taxation of interstate commerce, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1956) to regulate certain State taxation of interstate commerce, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-595, by Mr. Gingrey.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1956 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1096, H. Res. 939 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1956 (Business Activity Tax Simplification Act of 2005).
